settings.page_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our rituals, ingredients, and service. We're here to guide you on your journey.
settings.support_text: Our support team is available Monday through Friday, 9am - 5pm CET. We are happy to assist you personally.

settings.question: Where do you ship to?
settings.answer: We currently ship to all countries within the European Union. We are working on expanding our shipping options to other regions. Please check our shipping page for the most up-to-date information.

settings.question: How long will my order take to arrive?
settings.answer: Standard shipping within Germany takes 2-3 business days. For other EU countries, delivery typically takes 5-7 business days. You will receive a tracking number once your order has been shipped.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders over €50 within Germany. For international orders, free shipping is available on orders over €75.

settings.question: Are your ingredients organic?
settings.answer: Yes, all our ingredients are 100% organic and certified by recognized organic certification bodies. We source only the highest quality organic ingredients for our blends.

settings.question: How should I store my blends?
settings.answer: Store your blends in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the containers tightly sealed to maintain freshness. Our blends are best consumed within 12 months of opening.

settings.question: Are these products suitable for vegans?
settings.answer: Yes, all our products are 100% vegan. We use only plant-based ingredients and never include any animal-derived products in our formulations.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on unopened products. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days of delivery for a full refund.

settings.question: How do I initiate a return?
settings.answer: To initiate a return, please contact our customer support team at support@ayurvedicrituals.com with your order number. We will provide you with a return label and instructions.

settings.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
settings.answer: No, you can place an order as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track your orders, save your shipping addresses, and access exclusive offers.

settings.question: How do I reset my password?
settings.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. We will send you a link to reset your password. If you don't receive the email, please check your spam folder.
